item.title: Report X-2023120912
item.description:
Report X-2023120912

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-15
  • City: LOWELL
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: aT SOME POINT THE BOX WAS DROPPED UPSIDE DOWN CRACKING 3 OF THE LIDS AND LEAKING ONTO THE 4TH. ONCE DISCOVERED THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A HAZMAT BAG AND HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: 3 LIDS WERE CRACKED. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS PLACED UPRIGHT AND CONTAINED IN HAZMAT TOTE AND BAG.
